channel.title: Server Error Connecting
channel.description:
Hello Guys. Well i got This Problem. My Server isnt connecting. First I started with Portforwarding. Sure , Port 43594 is Open. Second , i searched for a source and Client , found one. Third , I Made a NO-IP , Added a host , Downloaded it and all , Sure , Finished. Fourth, i changed the IP , from CLIENT.Java. BUT WHY THE FUCK CANT I LOGIN !? I DID ALL WHAT I NEED TO DO ! :| :confused: :mad: :(
SKYPE : "Lirimoo" Add me iff u can help.

item.title: Server Error Connecting
item.dc:creator: @Lirimoo Lirimoo
item.description:
@Lirimoo wrote:

Hello Guys.
Well i got This Problem.
My Server isnt connecting.
First I started with Portforwarding. Sure , Port 43594 is Open.
Second , i searched for a source and Client , found one.
Third , I Made a NO-IP , Added a host , Downloaded it and all , Sure , Finished.
Fourth, i changed the IP , from CLIENT.Java.
BUT WHY THE FUCK CANT I LOGIN !? I DID ALL WHAT I NEED TO DO ! :mad:

SKYPE : “Lirimoo” Add me iff u can help.
